# import packages and data 
```{r}
library(ape)
library(adegenet)
library(phangorn)

dna <- fasta2DNAbin("2023-02-21-alignment_orthologs.fasta")
D <- dist.dna(dna, model = "JC69")
tre <- nj(D)

# parsimony 
parsimony(tre, dna)
tre.pars <- optim.parsimony(tre2, dna2)
plot(tre.pars, cex=0.6)
title("Parsimonious tree, Orthologs Feb 21")

# distance
tre <- ladderize(tre)
plot(tre, cex = 0.6)
title("Distance Tree, Orthologs Feb 21")
```
